risk_definition: Threats involving the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of sensitive data, including data leakage, tampering, destruction, or unauthorized access
Collection, processing, storage, or sharing of personally identifiable information (PII) or sensitive personal data that violates privacy principles and legal requirements
Attempts to bypass the security mechanisms, role settings, or operational boundaries of an AI system, including direct/indirect hint injection, jailbreak attacks, etc.
Attempts to obtain system privileges, access permissions, or execution permissions beyond the authorized scope
Attempts to execute arbitrary code, commands, or scripts on the target system, potentially resulting in complete control of the system
Involves unauthorized read, write, modify, or delete operations on the file system
Involves generating or disseminating malicious, illegal, or inappropriate content, including fraudulent, defamatory, infringing, or other harmful information
Exploiting system misconfigurations or insecure configurations for attacks or privilege acquisition
